verses.text: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* water \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* head, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H3605"\w* tears \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes? \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* weep day \w and|strong="H0853"\w* night \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* slain \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wilderness \w a|strong="H3588"\w* lodging \w place|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* wayfaring men, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*? \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* adulterers, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H0776"\w* transgressors.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* bent \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongue, \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* bow, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* lies, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* truth: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* strengthened \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w to|strong="H1980"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* known, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* take heed \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* brother \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w*: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* brother \w will|strong="H0376"\w* utterly supplant, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* walk deceitfully.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* mock \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* speak \w the|strong="H0853"\w* truth: \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w to|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w lies|strong="H4820"\w*: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* laboured \w to|strong="H3068"\w* commit iniquity.

Thy habitation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* deceit: \w Through|strong="H3651"\w* deceit \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* refused \w to|strong="H0559"\w* know \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Therefore thus saith \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H6310"\w* hosts: Behold \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* melt, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* try \w them|strong="H7760"\w*: \w for|strong="H0854"\w* \w what|strong="H6310"\w* \w else|strong="H7453"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* do \w before|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* piercing arrow, \w it|strong="H0518"\w* hath spoken deceit: \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* speaketh peace \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* friend, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* secretly \w he|strong="H0834"\w* lieth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* wait \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* visit \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* these \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord? \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w be|strong="H3808"\w* revenged \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* nation?

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* mountains \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* weeping \w and|strong="H3063"\w* lamentation, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beautiful places \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* desert, mourning: \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H3063"\w* burnt \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H3389"\w* not \w a|strong="H5414"\w* man \w that|strong="H5414"\w* passeth through \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* not heard \w the|strong="H0853"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* owner: \w from|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fowl \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* air \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* beasts \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H3063"\w* gone away \w and|strong="H3063"\w* departed.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* Jerusalem \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* heaps \w of|strong="H0776"\w* sand, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dens \w of|strong="H0776"\w* dragons: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* cities \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda desolate, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w want|strong="H1097"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* inhabitant.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wise man, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w this|strong="H0834"\w*, \w why|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* hath perished, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* burnt \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* passeth \w through|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord said: \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* forsaken \w my|strong="H0834"\w* law, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* gave \w them|strong="H0310"\w*, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* not heard \w my|strong="H0834"\w* voice, \w and|strong="H0001"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* not walked \w in|strong="H0001"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* gone after \w the|strong="H0853"\w* perverseness \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own heart, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* after Baalim, \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers taught \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3045"\w* \w thus|strong="H3808"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0001"\w* hosts \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* Israel: \w Behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w feed|strong="H3615"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* wormwood, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* give \w them|strong="H1992"\w* water \w of|strong="H0001"\w* gall \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations, \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* not known: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sword \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* till \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* consumed.

Thus saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H5869"\w* hosts \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Israel: \w Consider|strong="H5375"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* call \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mourning women, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* send \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* wise women, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w let|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*:

Let \w them|strong="H7993"\w* hasten \w and|strong="H0776"\w* take \w up|strong="H4908"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*: let \w our|strong="H3588"\w* eyes shed tears, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* eyelids run \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* waters.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sion: \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* wasted \w and|strong="H3068"\w* greatly confounded? \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* left \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* dwellings \w are|strong="H1697"\w* cast \w down|strong="H3588"\w*.

Hear \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w*, ye women, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* let \w your|strong="H0935"\w* ears receive \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* mouth: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* teach \w your|strong="H0935"\w* daughters wailing: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* every \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3772"\w* neighbor mourning.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5038"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* windows, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* entered \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* houses \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* young \w men|strong="H0120"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* streets.

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Even|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* carcass \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w as|strong="H3068"\w* dung upon \w the|strong="H0559"\w* face \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* country, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* grass behind \w the|strong="H0559"\w* back \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mower, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w none|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* gather \w it|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thus saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Let \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* man glory \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wisdom, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strong man glory \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* strength, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rich man glory \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* riches:

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w let|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* glorieth glory \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* understandeth \w and|strong="H0935"\w* knoweth \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* exercise \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* justice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* please \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Behold, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days come, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* visit \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foreskin circumcised.

Upon Egypt, and upon Juda, and upon Edom, and upon the children of Ammon, and upon Moab, and upon all that have their hair polled round, that dwell in the desert: for all the nations are uncircumcised in the flesh, but all the house of Israel are uncircumcised in the heart.
